snippet: Prosecutors in New York charged a 31-year-old man in Missouri on Friday with making at least eight bomb threats against Jewish centers, officials said....

headline.main: Trump to Host Germany's Merkel at the White House
headline.print_headline: Trump to Host Germany's Merkel at the White House

lead_paragraph: Prosecutors in New York charged a 31-year-old man in Missouri on Friday with making at least eight bomb threats against Jewish centers, officials said.
